title: Here's a curated list of 20 articles up to 2022 that delve into various aspects of misinformation and media bias
**"The Spread of True and False News Online"**
note: Soroush Vosoughi, Deb Roy, Sinan Aral (Science, 2018

author.literal: **"Fake News and the Spread of Misinformation"** - David M. J. Lazer et al.

title: **"Media Bias in the Era of Big Data: A Computational Analysis of Partisan News"** - Yochai Benkler, Robert Faris
**"The Echo Chamber Effect on Social Media"**
note: Walter Quattrociocchi, Antonio Scala, Cass R. Sunstein (Scientific Reports, 2016

title: **"Selective Exposure to Misinformation: Evidence from the Consumption of Fake News during the 2016 U.S
note: Presidential Campaign"** - Andrew Guess, Brendan Nyhan, Jason Reifler (European Research Council, 2018

title: **"The Role of the Media in the Construction of Public Belief and Social Change"**
**"The Influence of Media Bias on Public Opinion"**
**"The Filter Bubble: What the Internet is Hiding from You"**
**"The Dynamics of News Coverage and the Spread of Misinformation"**
note: Rothschild, Sharad Goel (Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, 2014

title: **"Partisan Media and Echo Chambers: The Impact of Conservative and Liberal News Sources on Political Attitudes and Behavior"**
**"The Political Economy of Media: Enduring Issues, Emerging Dilemmas"** - Robert W
**"The Role of Social Media in the Arab Spring"**
note: Philip N. Howard, Muzammil M. Hussain (Journal of Democracy, 2011

title: **"The Effects of Fake News on Political Attitudes and Behavior"** - Hunt Allcott

author.literal: **"Media Bias and the Marketplace of Ideas"** - Timothy J. Groseclose

title: **"The Impact of Fact-Checking on Misinformation in Social Media"**
**"The Role of Algorithms in the Spread of Fake News"**
note: Filippo Menczer, Alessandro Flammini (Communications of the ACM, 2016

title: **"Media Bias and the Influence of the Media on Public Opinion"** - Shanto Iyengar, Donald R
**"The Role of Social Media in the Fake News Phenomenon"**
note: Claire Wardle, Hossein Derakhshan (Council of Europe Report, 2017

title: **"The Influence of Social Media on Political Polarization"**
**"The Role of Media in Shaping Public Opinion"** - Maxwell McCombs

These articles cover a range of topics from the mechanics of misinformation spread, the role of social media, the impact of media bias on public opinion, and the broader implications for democracy and society
